title: Winter Clothing Drive
description: Urgent need for warm winter clothing for 200+ residents. Sizes ranging from children to adults.

title: Daily Meals Program
description: Provide nutritious meals for 150 individuals daily. Seeking sponsors for monthly meal programs.

title: Educational Supplies
description: Books, notebooks, and learning materials needed for after-school tutoring program serving 75 children.

title: Medical Supplies
description: First aid kits, prescription medications, and basic medical equipment for on-site health clinic.

title: Hygiene Kits
description: Toothbrushes, soap, shampoo, and other hygiene essentials for 300 individuals.

title: Bedding & Linens
description: Blankets, sheets, and pillows for newly opened wing accommodating 100 residents.
